description:
Scott is a cutie who grew up in a small town in Oregon.
He moved to California when he was 18 in order to chase girls and make a name for himself.
He says he loves cycling and skateboarding and showing off his lean torso to the ladies. He also does one mean backflip!
Scott has a really great personality and he was loads of fun to hang around.
I hate to be superficial, though, but his best asset is his big cock. Watch how he tears up the plastic pocket pussy!
title: Scott
